## Import Assignment 6 Data

```{r}
student6 <- read.table(file.choose(), header = TRUE, straingsAsFactor)
```
```{r}
library(plyr)
gender_mean <- ddply(student6,
                     "Sex",
                     summarise,
                     GradeAverage = mean(Grade, na.rm = TRUE))
```

```{r}
write.table(
  gender_mean,
  file = "gender_mean.txt",
  sep = "\t",
  row.names = FALSE)
```

## Filter Names Containing "i"
```{r}
i_students <- subset(
  student6,
  grepl("i", Name, ignore.case = TRUE)
)
```

```{r}
write.csv(
  i_students$Name,
  file = "i_students.csv",
  row.names = FALSE,
  quote = FALSE
)
```
## Export Filtered Dataset

```{r}
write.csv(
  i_students,
  file = "i_students_full.csv",
  row.names = FALSE
)
```
